findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint tokens at token launch without any limitations.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized user to upgrade the script.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The mint function is accessible without any access control or restrictions, allowing anyone to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected allowance function
findings.description: The allowance function is public and does not have any access modifiers or restrictions, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the contract's funds.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The _approveBase function does not have any access modifiers or checks, making it vulnerable to unauthorized approvals.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The _transferFromExcluded function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected deliver function
findings.description: The 'deliver' function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromReward function
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function can be called by anyone, including unauthorized users, which may lead to unintended behavior and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected includeInReward function
findings.description: The includeInReward function lacks proper access control and can be exploited by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromFee function
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function can be called by anyone, including unauthorized users, which may lead to unintended behavior and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected includeInFee function
findings.description: The includeInFee function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized access to fee-related functionality.

findings.title: Unprotected setMaxTxPercent function
findings.description: The setMaxTxPercent function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function
findings.description: The setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized users to burn tokens.
